General.Name: Duta Pertiwi Tbk
General.Description: PT Duta Pertiwi Tbk primarily engages in the real estate business in Indonesia. The company operates through Real Estate, Property, and Hotel segments. It offers shop houses, industrial properties, commercial lots, apartments, international trade centers, shopping malls, superblocks, office buildings, and land; and rents and manages real estate properties. It also operates hotels and a recreation arena. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in North Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Duta Pertiwi Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Bumi Serpong Damai Tbk.
General.Address: ITC Mangga Dua, North Jakarta, Indonesia, 14430
